name: Zombie Dead Shoot
description:
S viruses spread all over the world, a large number of people are infected with viruses S and become zombies. You are one of the survivors. Zombies run everywhere in the city to looking for humans to eat, you are involved in the war against the zombies, merciless,bloody, no mercy. Shooting zombies to save the city!

Features:
•Experience the unlimited thrill of killing a zombie via simulation
•Aspire to become a first class contract zombie killer
•Hit musical soundtrack, scary sounds
•Great next generation game scene
